name: Ludum Dare 49 (Slippery Scope)
description:
Your turret will automatically fire at incoming enemies, but it's up to you to mix the right set of upgrades to stay safe without your turret becoming too unstable

Instructions
  1. Toggle upgrades with the left-hand HUD buttons
  2. Pan around the map with the minimap in the bottom-right corner
  3. Watch the turret fire at enemies
  4. Don't overdo it or your turret will become unstable
  5. Don't let enemies hit you or else your turret will become unstable
